text: Aldgate East is a London Underground station. It is between Aldgate and Whitechapel in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets. The station is in Travelcard Zone 1. It is on the Hammersmith & City Line between Liverpool Street and Whitechapel, and the District Line between Tower Hill and Whitechapel. == Image gallery == Image:Aldgate_east_station_c1895.jpg|Aldgate East tube station as it was around 1895 ==Related pages== *List of London Underground stations ==References== * * == Other websites == * London's Abandoned Tube Stations - Aldgate East Category:District line stations Category:Hammersmith & City line stations Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets Category:London Travelcard zone 1
title: Aldgate East tube station
